title: An Innovative Attention-based Triplet Deep Hashing Approach to Retrieve Histopathology Images
details: SM Alizadeh, MS Helfroush, ME Celebi - Journal of Imaging Informatics in Medicine, 2024
abstract: Content-based histopathology image retrieval (CBHIR) can assist in the diagnosis of different diseases. The retrieval procedure can be complex and time-consuming if high-dimensional features are required. Thus, hashing techniques are employed to …

title: Empowering multi-step reasoning across languages via program-aided language models
details: L Ranaldi, G Pucci, B Haddow, A Birch - Proceedings of the 2024 Conference on …, 2024
abstract: In-context learning methods are popular inference strategies where Large Language Models (LLMs) are elicited to solve a task using provided demonstrations without parameter updates. Among these approaches are the reasoning methods, best …
